personalInfo.title: INGENIEUR en spécialité génie civil et développement durable
personalInfo.status: Disponible pour un stage à partir de juin
personalInfo.tagline: Innovative Solutions in Sustainable Infrastructure: Designing Resilient and Eco-Friendly Civil Engineering Projects
personalInfo.description: I'm a motivated Civil Engineer with 2 years of experience in structural design, site supervision, and BIM modeling. I bring a solid foundation in engineering principles, combined with hands-on knowledge of tools like AutoCAD, Revit, Civil 3D, and Robot Structural Analysis. I've supported the successful execution of residential and commercial building projects by coordinating teams, managing deadlines, and ensuring on-site quality control. Beyond technical skills, I'm known for being detail-oriented, proactive, and a strong communicator --- essential for effective project coordination. I also bring a working knowledge of sustainable design principles, lean construction methods, and digital collaboration tools (like BIM 360), which are increasingly vital in today's construction market.

Rédaction de rapports techniques (CCTP, DQR, DCE, Cahier des Charges)
